message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While your offer is tempting, the lowest I'm willing to go is $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
